name: Apocalypse Adept 2
description:
THE SEQUEL IS HERE!!!

THE NEW GAME INCLUDES:

  • 4 weapons!
  • New colors!
  • Reload time display!
  • New map!
  • Power-Ups!
  • Zombies get stronger as time goes on!
  • Pause menu!

PLEASE TELL YOUR FRIENDS ABOUT THIS! I WORKED REALLY HARD ON IT THE LAST....IDK HOW LONG. I WOULD REALLY LOVE IT IF YOU HELPED WITH THIS GETTING VIEWS.

The link is: deliriny2020.itch.io/apad2

Thank you for everything, have a great day.

No, seriously.

Have a GREAT day!

-Deliriny2020
